wobani.component.light.blinnphong

Class BlinnPhongDirectionalLightComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.core.Component
      • wobani.component.light.blinnphong.BlinnPhongLightComponent

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentBase, Invalidatable

    public class BlinnPhongDirectionalLightComponent
extends BlinnPhongLightComponent
    Basic implementation of a directional light source.

        Initializes a new BlinnPhongDirectionalLightComponent to the given values. All of the parameters's components must be min. 0.

        diffuse - diffuse color
        specular - specular color
        ambient - ambient color

      • computeLightParameters

        @Internal
 @NotNull
protected java.nio.FloatBuffer computeLightParameters()
        Description copied from class: BlinnPhongLightComponent
        Creates a FloatBuffer which contains all the light's parameters like diffuse color, position etc. The FloatBuffer's content must follow the memory layout of the shader's light struct.
        Specified by:
        computeLightParameters in class BlinnPhongLightComponent
        Returns:
        the light's parameters
